Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's adventures within a circus setting, where he faces challenges from a disgruntled former strongman, Matto Grasso, and ultimately resolves the conflict before returning to his solitary life.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction and Public Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and then shifts to the general public arriving at the circus, showcasing their wonder at the attractions.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Circus and Giraffe Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Conflict with Billings and Matto Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the man in checkered shirt encountering a tense situation involving Billings, leading to a physical confrontation with Matto Grasso and escalating threats.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating Sounds of Trouble and Encountering Billings
Confrontation and Attack by Matto Grasso
Overpowering Matto Grasso and Immediate Aftermath

sub_scenes.title: Circus Owner Recruits Paul Bunyan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the encounter between the circus owner and the strongman (Paul Bunyan), revealing Matto Grasso's backstory and the owner's recruitment of Paul Bunyan as the new strongman.

narrative_arcs.title: Owner's Exposition on Matto Grasso's Threats

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Attempts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's vengeful plans and actions against Paul Bunyan, including arson and releasing an ape, leading to chaos at the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Paul Bunyan and Matto Grasso's Revenge Plot
The Fire and Paul Bunyan's Resolution
Matto Grasso's Lingering Frustration and New Scheme
The Ape's Release and Paul Bunyan's Intervention
The Chase Begins: Paul Bunyan Pursues Matto Grasso

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Capture in the Circus Arena
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes the chase between Paul Bunyan and Matto Grasso within the circus arena, culminating in Matto Grasso's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Farewell to Circus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Paul Bunyan's circus story with the ringmaster offering him a job, which he declines, choosing to return to his quiet life in the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Marco Polo's perilous journey and his encounter with the Awful Ogress of Tibet. It involves themes of rescue, deception, and magical combat, culminating in a royal reward.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Peril and Gruesome Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene of Marco Polo's adventure in Tibet and introduces a macabre element with the discovery of a talking severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Reward and Journey to Hi-Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Marco Polo rescuing a bound man, receiving a sacred dagger as thanks, and then arriving at Hi-Town, initially mistaking mourning for celebration.

sub_scenes.title: Quest for the Missing Princess and the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the King's grief over his missing daughter, Princess Lotus, prompting Marco Polo to offer help and then encounter a beggar woman who leads him to a witch's castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Meeting the King and the Missing Princess
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Revealing the 'Children'
Transformation and Confrontation with the Ogress
Impending Battle with Mice and Claws

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Escape from the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the capture of a young man and Princess Lotus by the Ogress, followed by their daring escape using the sacred dagger.

narrative_arcs.title: Attack, Escape Attempt and Capture by Snakes
Further Restraint and Threat of Revenge
The Surprise Attack and Ogress's Defeat

sub_scenes.title: Return to Hi-Town and Royal Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes the escape from the dungeon, the return to Hi-Town, cultural misunderstanding, and the royal reunion, where Marco Polo declines a marriage proposal but is honored.

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Captain's Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of buried treasure, betrayal, and revenge set in a British penal colony. It follows Jordan's quest for retribution against Captain Brooking who stole his treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a narrator setting a tone of treasure and danger, then introduces the setting of a British penal colony and the routine life there.

sub_scenes.title: Prisoner's Treasure Tale and Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details a prisoner urgently seeking a private conversation with the Captain, revealing a story of buried treasure and striking a deal for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Betrayal and Jordan's Vow
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal, leaving Jordan in despair and solitary confinement, leading to Jordan's vow of revenge over years of imprisonment.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Attic Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Jordan's vigil, his confrontation with Captain Brooking, the deceptive agreement, and Jordan's arrival at Brooking's home, setting up the final betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Brooking's Home: A Luxurious Trap
Ascent to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Police Intervention and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the treasure story with police arriving at the scene, Brooking's escape attempt and capture, and a narrator delivering a moral conclusion.

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Dr. Styx and Henry Northrup investigating the haunted Matthews estate. It combines elements of mystery, supernatural investigation, and redemption.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and Courtroom Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx in a confrontational scene and then shifts to a courtroom drama where Vincent Matthews is sentenced to death for murder.

sub_scenes.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate and Northrup's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Northrup and the troubled Matthews estate, establishing its haunted reputation and Northrup's expertise in supernatural matters, leading to his arrival at the estate.

narrative_arcs.title: The White Elephant Estate and Unsavory Events
Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Estate
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Northrup's entry into the haunted house and his immediate confrontation with the ghostly presence of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sinister Voice of Vincent Matthews

sub_scenes.title: Dialogue, Confession and Salvation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a dialogue between Northrup and the ghost, leading to the ghost's confession of fear, the revelation of salvation through forgiveness and love, and the need for Rosalind's forgiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Seeking Salvation
The Condition for Rest and the Forgiver's Identity
Resistance and Compulsion to Confront Rosalind
Identification and Introduction of the Accused
The Troubled House and the Drive to Town

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Quest for the Northwest Passage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc chronicles Henry Hudson's voyages in search of the Northwest Passage to China, highlighting his determination, the crew's growing discontent, and the tragic mutiny that ends his journey.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Setup and Mission Commission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides historical context for Henry Hudson's life and sets up his mission commissioned by the Dutch East India Company to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Historical Context of Henry Hudson's Fate
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage Struggles and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes the initial voyage's struggles, including crew discontent, threat of mutiny, exploration of the Hudson River, and eventual return to Holland due to failure.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Mutiny and Turning South
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
False Alarm and Realization of Dead End
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a new voyage, initial hope, icy conditions leading to winter quarters, and ultimately, a mutiny against Captain Hudson.

narrative_arcs.title: Extreme Northerly Route and Icy Predicament
The Ice Melts and Voyage Recommences
Mutiny and Captain's Assertion of Authority
Return of the Mutineers and Grim News

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan, the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates Hassan's heroic quest to rescue a kidnapped girl from the Tartar horsemen led by Kurgan. It features themes of bravery, combat, and a developing romance.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Tartar Threat and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and the Tartar threat, with the Caliph assigning Hassan the mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph and the Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Journey and Trail Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's journey, his anticipation of reaching the oasis, finding the Tartars' tracks, and receiving a warning from another traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Oasis and Discovery of Tracks
Following the Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Camp Contact
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Hassan reaching the Tartar camp, subduing a sentry, using disguise to infiltrate, and overhearing crucial information leading him to the prisoner.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp - The Search Begins
Reaching the Prisoner and Making Contact

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Trial by Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's discovery by Tartar guards, his capture, and subsequent interrogation and challenge by Kurgan for a trial by combat.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Unfair Fight Begins
Dirt in the Eyes and Immediate Attack

sub_scenes.title: Victory, Release and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's success in the unfair fight, Kurgan honoring his word, the woman's gratitude, and a romantic resolution as they approach Bagdad.
